channel.title: Rune 2H Stab,Lunge, Slash, Block animations change?
channel.description:
Hi again, I searched in google how to change Rune 2h attack animations (Stab,Lunge, Slash, Block) and dont founded ;/ Any 1 can send link or steps how to change animations cuz my rune 2h animations is like: Stab animation like Slash
Looks like that [URL=http://www.part.lt/perziura/070ac98d991072f8ba944cd806413629311.png][IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/070ac98d991072f8ba944cd806413629311.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Rune 2H Stab,Lunge, Slash, Block animations change?
item.dc:creator: @Deptas1599 Deptas1599
item.description:
@Deptas1599 wrote:

if(weaponName.contains("2h sword") || weaponName.contains("godsword") || weaponName.contains("saradomin sword")) { switch(c.fightMode) { case 0: return 7041; case 2: return 7042; case 1: return 7048; } }
its mine

changed to

if(weaponName.contains(“2h sword”) || weaponName.contains(“godsword”) || weaponName.contains(“saradomin sword”)) {
switch(c.fightMode) {
case 2:
return 7041;
case 0:
return 7042;
case 1:
return 7048;

and now everything ok TY anyway
